Interface LinuxRpmPackage

    • create

      static LinuxRpmPackage create(LinuxPackage pkg, LinuxRpmPackageMixin mixin)
      Constructs LinuxRpmPackage instance from the given LinuxPackage and LinuxRpmPackageMixin instances.
      Parameters:
      pkg - the Linux package
      mixin - RPM-specific details supplementing the generic package
